name: Zhipu AI
description: Zhipu AI (智谱AI) provides the GLM series of models, known for complex reasoning and long context capabilities.

auth.instructions: Use the API Key (format: {id}.{secret}) directly as the Bearer token. Alternatively, you can generate a JWT token using the key.

error_codes.description: Rate limit exceeded or insufficient quota
Method not supported by current model

models.name: GLM-4 Plus
models.description: High-Intelligence Flagship: Comprehensive performance enhancement with significantly improved capabilities for long texts and complex tasks.

models.name: GLM-4 Air (250414)
models.description: High Cost-Effectiveness: The model that offers the best balance between reasoning capabilities and price.

models.name: GLM-4 Long
models.description: Ultra-Long Input: Specifically designed for handling extremely long texts and memory-intensive tasks.

models.name: GLM-4 AirX
models.description: Ultra-Fast Inference: Featuring extremely fast reasoning speed and powerful reasoning performance.

models.name: GLM-4 FlashX (250414)
models.description: High-Speed, Low-Cost: Flash-enhanced version, featuring ultra-fast inference speed and higher concurrency guarantees.

models.name: GLM-4 Flash (250414)
models.description: Free Model: Zero-cost access to the language model.

models.name: GLM-Z1 Air
models.description: Reasoning Model: Equipped with strong reasoning capabilities, suitable for tasks requiring deep reasoning.

models.name: GLM-Z1 AirX
models.description: Ultra-Fast Inference: Featuring extremely fast inference speed (up to 200 tokens/s).

models.name: GLM-Z1 FlashX
models.description: High-Speed, Low-Cost: Flash-enhanced version with ultra-fast inference speed and even greater concurrency guarantees.

models.name: GLM-Z1 Flash
models.description: Free Inference: Free inference API, enabling zero-cost access to large reasoning models.

models.name: GLM-4.1V Thinking Flash
models.description: Visual Reasoning: The strongest visual reasoning model in the 10B size class.

models.name: GLM-4V Plus (0111)
models.description: Image/Video Understanding: Outstanding multimodal understanding, processing up to 5 images or 2h video.

models.name: GLM-4V Flash
models.description: Free Model: Supports single-image understanding for basic image analysis.

models.name: CogVideoX-3
models.description: Video Generation: Significant improvements in image quality, stability, and physical realism simulation.

models.name: CogVideoX-2
models.description: Video Generation: Easily create videos using text or images as input.

models.name: CogVideoX Flash
models.description: Video Generation: A free and user-friendly video generation model.

models.name: Vidu Q1
models.description: Video Generation: Focused on high-quality video creation for film, ads, and anime.

models.name: Vidu 2
models.description: Video Generation: Balanced speed and quality, focusing on image-to-video and start/end frame functions.

models.name: CogView-4
models.description: Image Generation: Strong complex semantic alignment, supports any length Chinese/English input.

models.name: CogView-3 Flash
models.description: Free Model: A free image generation model.

models.name: GLM-Realtime
models.description: Real-Time Video Call: Capable of real-time reasoning across text, audio, and video.

models.name: GLM-4 Voice
models.description: End-to-End Speech Model: Directly understand and generate Chinese/English speech.

models.name: CharGLM-4
models.description: Humanlike Model: Suitable for emotional companionship and virtual characters.

models.name: Emohaa
models.description: Psychological Model: Professional counseling capabilities for emotional support.

models.name: CodeGeeX-4
models.description: Code Model: Suitable for code auto-completion tasks.

models.name: Rerank
models.description: Reranking Model: Computes score values between texts and reranks retrieval results.

models.name: Embedding-3
models.description: Latest text embedding model with improved performance.

models.name: Embedding-2
models.description: General text embedding model.
